analysis.description:
LescovexERC20.holdedOf (/unique_chucks/13/0x5bf5f85480848eb92af31e610cd65902bcf22648.sol#102-129) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- iNotValid == 0 || holded[_owner].time[iValid] >= requiredTime (/unique_chucks/13/0x5bf5f85480848eb92af31e610cd65902bcf22648.sol#110-115)
	- holded[_owner].time[i] < requiredTime (/unique_chucks/13/0x5bf5f85480848eb92af31e610cd65902bcf22648.sol#120-127)
